TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ManagementDateTimeConverter extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供方法，將 DMTF 日期時間和時間間隔轉換為符合 CLR 標準的 和 格式，反之亦然。

span.span: Provides methods to convert DMTF datetime and time intervals to CLR-compliant and format and vice versa.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig valuetype System.DateTime ToDateTime(string dmtfDate) cil managed
Public Shared Function ToDateTime (dmtfDate As String) As DateTime

param.name: dmtfDate
param.span: 字串，表示 DMTF 格式的日期時間。

span.span: A string representing the datetime in DMTF format.

summary.span: 將指定的 DMTF 日期時間轉換為 。

span.span: Converts a given DMTF datetime to .

summary.span: 傳回的 將使用目前的系統時區。

span.span: The returned will be in the current time zone of the system.

returns.span: ，表示指定的 DMTF 日期時間。

span.span: A that represents the given DMTF datetime.

remarks.format: ## Remarks DMTF 日期時間格式表示的日期和時間在 WMI 中。Date and time in WMI is represented in DMTF datetime format. WMI SDK 文件將說明這種格式。This format is explained in WMI SDK documentation. DMTF datetime 字串具有 UTC 位移這個日期時間字串表示。A DMTF datetime string has an UTC offset which this datetime string represents. 在轉換期間，UTC 時差用來將日期轉換成目前的時區。During conversion to , the UTC offset is used to convert the date to the current time zone. 根據 DMTF 格式可以表示特定欄位的字元 ' \*'。According to DMTF format, a particular field can be represented by the character '\*'. 這將會轉換成可以用來表示這個欄位的值。This will be converted to the value of this field that can be represented in . ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例將轉換成 DMTF datetime 字串。The following example converts a DMTF datetime string into a . [!code-csharp[wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDateTime#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDateTime/cs/ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDateTime.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDateTime#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDateTime/vb/ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDateTime.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig string ToDmtfDateTime(valuetype System.DateTime date) cil managed
Public Shared Function ToDmtfDateTime (date As DateTime) As String

param.name: date
param.span: ，表示要轉換為 DMTF 日期時間的日期時間。

span.span: A representing the datetime to be converted to DMTF datetime.

summary.span: 將指定的 轉換為 DMTF 日期時間格式。

span.span: Converts a given to DMTF datetime format.

returns.span: 字串，表示指定 的 DMTF 日期時間。

span.span: A string that represents the DMTF datetime for the given .

remarks.format: ## Remarks DMTF 日期時間格式表示的日期和時間在 WMI 中。Date and time in WMI is represented in DMTF datetime format. WMI SDK 文件將說明這種格式。This format is explained in WMI SDK documentation. 相對於目前時區的 UTC 位移，就會表示 DMTF datetime 字串。The DMTF datetime string represented will be with respect to the UTC offset of the current time zone. DMTF 中的最低有效位數是百萬分之一秒為單位。在，最低的有效位數是，這相當於 100 奈秒。The lowest precision in DMTF is microseconds; in , the lowest precision is , which are equivalent to 100 nanoseconds. 在轉換期間，會轉換成百萬分之一秒為單位，四捨五入至最接近微秒。During conversion, are converted to microseconds and rounded off to the nearest microsecond. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會將轉換給定DMTF 日期時間格式。The following example converts a given to DMTF datetime format. [!code-csharp[wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDmtfDateTime#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDmtfDateTime/cs/ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDmtfDateTime.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDmtfDateTime#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDmtfDateTime/vb/ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDmtfDateTime.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 WMI 中的時間間隔是 DMTF 日期時間格式表示。Time interval in WMI is represented in DMTF datetime format. WMI SDK 文件將說明這種格式。This format is explained in WMI SDK documentation. DMTF 中的最低有效位數是百萬分之一秒為單位。在，最低的有效位數是，這相當於 100 奈秒。The lowest precision in DMTF is microseconds; in , the lowest precision is , which is equivalent to 100 nanoseconds. 在轉換期間，會轉換成百萬分之一秒為單位，四捨五入至最接近微秒。During conversion, are converted to microseconds and rounded off to the nearest microsecond. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會將轉換給定DMTF 時間間隔。The following example converts a given to DMTF time interval. [!code-csharp[wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDmtfTimeInterval#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDmtfTimeInterval/cs/ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDmtfTimeInterval.cs#1)] [!code-vb[wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDmtfTimeInterval#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WindowsServer/wminet_ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDmtfTimeInterval/vb/ManagementDateTimeConverter_ToDmtfTimeInterval.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 WMI 中的時間間隔是以 DMTF 格式表示。Time interval in WMI is represented in DMTF format. WMI SDK 文件將說明這種格式。This format is explained in WMI SDK documentation. DMTF 時間間隔值為多個屬於然後就會擲回。If the DMTF time interval value is more than that of then is thrown. ## .NET Framework 安全性.NET Framework Security 完全信任立即呼叫者。Full trust for the immediate caller. 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。This member cannot be used by partially trusted code. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md). ## Examples 下列範例會將轉換到的給定的 DMTF 時間間隔。The following example converts a given DMTF time interval to .
